testcase.name: Add a user to webtable and validate that user has been added
testcase.system-out: Given I open the site "http://www.way2automation.com/angularjs-protractor/webtables/".passed When I add user with the following information "TestFirstName1" "TestLastName1" "testusername1" "test123456" "testuser1@testcompany.com" "123-456-1000".passed Then user "TestFirstName1" exists in table..................................passed

testcase.name: get employee
testcase.system-out: Given an employee exist in the database with id "2".........................passed When user retrieves employee info by id.....................................passed Then the status code for get employee is 200................................passed And response includes the following employee info...........................passed

testcase.name: Add a user to webtable and validate that user has been added
testcase.system-out: Given I open the site "http://www.way2automation.com/angularjs-protractor/webtables/".passed When I add user with the following information "TestFirstName" "TestLastName" "testusername" "test12345" "testuser@testcompany.com" "123-456-7890".passed Then user "TestFirstName" exists in table...................................passed
